amendment.description: To provide for a deficit-neutral reserve fund to improve health insurance.

vote.text: Amendment SA 635 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 635 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Enzi. (consideration: CR S3698-3702; text: CR S3700) To provide for a deficit-neutral reserve fund to improve health insurance.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 635 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 635 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Enzi.
